column4: Rick Steiner and Dick Murdoch defeated Tim Horner and Kendall Windham
Arn Anderson and Tully Blanchard (c) (with J.J. Dillon) fought Sting and Nikita Koloff to a time-limit draw
The Midnight Express (Bobby Eaton and Stan Lane) (with Jim Cornette) defeated The Fantastics (Bobby Fulton and Tommy Rogers) (c)
The Road Warriors (Hawk and Animal), Steve Williams, Jimmy Garvin and Ron Garvin (with Precious) defeated Kevin Sullivan, Mike Rotunda, Al Perez, Russian Assassin and Ivan Koloff (with Gary Hart)
Barry Windham (c) (with J.J. Dillon) defeated Dusty Rhodes
Ric Flair (c) (with J.J. Dillon) defeated Lex Luger
